name: Digital Restoration of Early Renaissance Paintings
description: Virtual restoration project for generating 3D models of restored Early Renaissance Italian panel paintings displayed at the North Carolina Museum of Art (NCMA)

name: Pigment Separation Using X-Ray Elemental Maps of a Painting
description: Design project for an algorithm that can separate restored areas in a painting from its original areas and generate images showing areas where specific pigments were used

name: User Movement Characterization in VR Systems
description: Data collection project for extracting characteristics of users' translational and rotational movements in VR systems

name: AR-based Labeling for DNN Fine-tuning
description: A smartphone AR application where a user and a fine-tuned Faster RCNN model collaboratively generate image labels for a training dataset for a deep neural network

name: Visualization of Author Collaboration and Publication Relationships â€“ Insight Engine 2.0
description: An interface built with the Unity game engine that represents author collaboration relationships and publications data extracted from more than 2 million papers published in the ACM journal until 2016

name: Contemporary Art Recommendation System
description: A website that recommends paintings of contemporary artists that were born in the 1980s or later based on users' preferences in extrinsic and intrinsic characteristics of artworks to raise awareness about emerging artists' work

name: Personas and Storyboarding
description: User interaction and experience study of a coffee machine in Brown's Center for Information Technology (CIT)

name: Responsive Redesign
description: Redesigning project of a website that introduced worldwide train trip information to improve its usability, learnability, efficiency, and accessibility

name: React Development
description: Design project using React where I designed a website for an online bakery with sort, filter, display functionalities
